name: Greenback
description:
Follow Harry Cashman, the entitled hipster out for revenge against his father who has done nothing to deserve it. With no weapons or fighting abilities to speak of, Harry must bribe people to leave him alone.

- - -

Features
  • Difficult twitch platforming with elements of bullet hell
  • 3 boss fights
  • Boss rush mode. Can you beat them all without health recovery? Try beating the story first!
  • Attention to detail and presentation
  • A "rich" story complete with cutscenes

- - -

Controls

F toggles fullscreen

A and D to move

Space to jump and double jump

Mouse to aim

Left click to shoot

Right click to dash

Dashing makes you invulnerable for its duration

You get 3 hits. You recover hits between levels unless it's boss rush

- - -

Credits

Artwork, voice acting, sound, music, writing and level designing by Archie "KAI" Reid (https://twitter.com/thekaigames)

Programming and level designing by Finn Truman (https://finnttruman.wixsite.com/portfolio)

Made in GameMaker Studio 2
